heroCards.title: Local Made Smarter
heroCards.description: Local Genius is your AI-powered local assistant. No apps. No downloads. Just fast, secure recommendations from top-rated local businesses.

heroCards.title: Simple, Honest Pricing
heroCards.description: Unlimited local recommendations powered by GPT-4 and real human insight all for one clear, honest price.

heroCards.title: Instant Access
heroCards.description: Get real-time, trusted local recs by text or chat, wherever you are.

heroCards.title: Private and Secure
heroCards.description: Your conversations always stay private. No tracking. No data selling. Just secure, trusted answers you can count on.
